markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hero's Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2643) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 131 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Energize Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2639)

</column>

---

Your wings have grown to their full, majestic form, granting you the unlimited power of flight. You have a fly Speed of 25 feet at all times. Furthermore, sprites recognize you as a powerful hero (or villain) by your unique wings and are appropriately impressed. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on all Diplomacy and Intimidation checks against sprites and gain the benefits of the [Glad-Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=5153) skill feat against other sprites, without taking a  –5 penalty to your Diplomacy check.
name: Hero's Wings

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Hero's Wings Source Ancestry Guide pg. 131 3.0 Prerequisites Energize Wings --- Your wings have grown to their full, majestic form, granting you the unlimited power of flight. You have a fly Speed of 25 feet at all times. Furthermore, sprites recognize you as a powerful hero (or villain) by your unique wings and are appropriately impressed. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on all Diplomacy and Intimidation checks against sprites and gain the benefits of the Glad-Hand skill feat against other sprites, without taking a –5 penalty to your Diplomacy check.
